p: According to these results, the commonly used hydrodistillation is an efficient technology for citrus EO extraction. The highest EO yield reached about 3%, which meet the 1–3% fresh weight of citrus peel on average ( Lemes et al., 2018), also it is similar to the CP-EO from Citrus aurantifolia peel reported by Lemes et al. (2018). But the citrus EO yield was significantly higher than what Zhang et al. reported, which is only about 0.5% ( Zhang et al., 2019). In that case, the citrus variety used (Citrus aurantifolia) maybe the reason, as well as the different extraction techniques employed influenced the EO yield. Compared to the previous reported yield, citrus EO yield in this was very outstanding. This indicates that Citrus reticulate Blanco (Ponkan) peels is an attractive raw material for EO with adequate development value.
